html:
daughter of Zion. This term refers to the city of Jerusalem as well as to its inhabitants (Lam. 1:6-8; 2:10; Zech. 9:9).

cottage/hut/besieged city. All that remains in Jerusalem are the cottages and huts. The watchtowers have been removed, and the watchmen (the prophets) have been taken away (Ezek. 3:17-21; 33:1). Jerusalem, which once housed the mighty spiritual fortress—God's temple—is now like a cottage.
